Dating: LATE PERIOD (not before); GRAECO-ROMAN PERIOD (not after)
Name: Cat of bronze
Description: This bronze figurine, which was part of the É. de Meester de Ravestein collection but of which the provenance is not known, is a beautiful example of the sacred animal of the goddess Bastet. The eyes were inlaid and the ears were equipped with ear-rings. The piece dates from the Late Kingdom or from the Ptolemaic Period.
